name: Krumpet Town Demo
description:
Krumpet Town is a slice of life meets horror game.   Customize your character, explore exciting new environments, help your neighbors, and investigate the strange occurrences that are taking place on your home island!

Krumpet Town is still in development, and this is a beta release.  We are working to make a smooth gaming experience and add more features as the project progresses.  We always appreciate feedback, positive or constructive.  Thanks for playing!
